ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 129
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Make it 3. Actually, I don t care anymore because his articles are so consistently mega quotes/low content, that egregiously long .sig, and the wack-o
ygData.messageBody:
The weather is here, wish you were beautiful writes:
> From: "The weather is here, wish you were beautiful" <douglas@...>
>
> On Mon, 13 Sep 1999, dlobdell wrote:
>
> > Well that is my automatic signature, and in no way do I intend on
> > removing it for YOU, since you have been the only person to point it
> > out.
>
> Make it two people who have complained. Basic etiquette has asked for
> many years that sig files be kept to four lines or less of 80 characters
> or less.

Make it 3.

Actually, I don't care anymore because his articles are so
consistently mega'quotes/low content, that egregiously long .sig, and
the wack-o formatting with all the +AC bullXXXX involved, that
anything from him goes to the bit bucket before I even see it.

*BUT*, I wanted to let him know via the list that he shouldn't think a
second think that just one person is more than a little irritated by
it.

--
Frake, Rodcet Nife
Iilii, Xegony
